category.description: Programme: Legal basis for research funding

result.title: Lessons from existing platforms
result.description: This report will provide an overview of Collective Awareness Platforms which are relevant to ChainReact, with a focus on citizen reporting. The aim of this deliverable is to produce a comprehensive and up-to-date account of the citizen reporting area, highlighting lessons which can be learned from existing platforms and offering guidance on whether/how to adapt the positioning of ChainReact platforms in response to what is learned.

result.title: Dissemination Plan
result.description: A dissemination plan will be outlined, where dissemination activities via various channels will be planned as described in Task 2.1. The advisory board will be notified for input. The dissemination plan will also set objectives for each of the target audiences and develop a communication strategy tailored to the audience. Each of the target areas of outreach will have a champion from the Advisory Board.

result.title: Formal Modelling of Federated Identity
result.description: Formal definitions of decentralization, privacy, security, and anonymity properties will be developed and proven using automatic proof-proving on the federated identity protocol. Results will be validated against open-source code. Depends on D2.2.

result.title: Final Report
result.description: Final Report (M26, Report, PU, Responsible: WAAG) At the end of the project there will be a final report, containing every relevant aspect of the project. The report will document project progress in relation to S/T objectives. It will also justify the costs incurred and effort spent by each partner. Cost statements will be part of this project report.

result.title: Annual dev. review and prototype - wikirate.org - III
result.description: A week before the quarterly huddles, described in WP6 and in 3.3.1 (Development Coordination), a short internal 3-page report (what we call a Pre-Huddle-report) on the progress in regards to each of the tasks of WP7 is circulated.
